headline: Bitcoin News: 5 Signals That BTC Bottoming Phase May Be Ending
summary: Bitcoin news shows signs that its long bottoming phase is fading after months of sideways action. Bitcoin USD hovered near recent highs this week as volatility stayed muted, a pattern traders often see before a larger move. The setup matters because long consolidations often decide whether the next chapter brings ...

headline: Gold Rally Has Room to Run on Dollar Exodus, Amundi Says
summary: The transition toward gold and away from the greenback is also being driven by large US deficits and question marks over future Federal Reserve policy, Vincent Mortier, chief investment officer at Europe’s largest money manager, said in a Bloomberg Television interview.  “We have allocated to gold for the last two years and a half, and I think it can continue, because gold in the long term is a very good protection against debasement and a good way to maintain some purchasing power,” he said.

content.title: Gold Rally Has Room to Run on Dollar Exodus, Amundi Says
content.summary: The transition toward gold and away from the greenback is also being driven by large US deficits and question marks over future Federal Reserve policy, Vincent Mortier, chief investment officer at Europe’s largest money manager, said in a Bloomberg Television interview.  “We have allocated to gold for the last two years and a half, and I think it can continue, because gold in the long term is a very good protection against debasement and a good way to maintain some purchasing power,” he said.

headline: After BlackRock’s Ethereum nod: Tom Lee buys $118m of crypto as price dips
summary: Ethereum is still down 40% from all-time high. Digital asset treasury firm Bitmine is buying the dip. Wall Street bets big on Ethereum for tokenisation.

content.title: After BlackRock’s Ethereum nod: Tom Lee buys $118m of crypto as price dips
content.summary: Ethereum is still down 40% from all-time high. Digital asset treasury firm Bitmine is buying the dip. Wall Street bets big on Ethereum for tokenisation.

thumbnail.caption: Bitmine purchased another $118 million of Ethereum, bringing its total holdings to $12.5 billion, the firm announced Monday.  Illustration: Andrés Tapia; Source: Shutterstock.

headline: XRG to increase stake in NextDecade’s Rio Grande LNG project
summary: Trains 4 and 5 are each expected to produce around 6mtpa of LNG and are backed by long-term deals with offtakers.

content.title: XRG to increase stake in NextDecade’s Rio Grande LNG project
content.summary: Trains 4 and 5 are each expected to produce around 6mtpa of LNG and are backed by long-term deals with offtakers.

thumbnail.caption: XRG will acquire an additional 7.6% stake in Trains 4 and 5 at the Rio Grande LNG project. Credit: Leonardo da/Shutterstock.com.

headline: Why This Week May Be A Game-Changer For The Federal Reserve
summary: Rick Rieder, BlackRock's chief investment officer for fixed income, has surged to the top of prediction market odds for President Donald Trump's pick to serve as the next Federal Reserve chairman.  Trump's next pick to lead the Fed and his broader push to reshape monetary policy may overshadow this week's two-day Fed meeting, which will wrap up with a 2 p.m. ET policy update on Wednesday.  A news conference with current chair Jerome Powell will immediately follow.

content.title: Why This Week May Be A Game-Changer For The Federal Reserve

Trump's next pick to lead the Fed and his broader push to reshape monetary policy may overshadow this week's two-day Fed meeting, which will wrap up with a 2 p.m. ET policy update on Wednesday.  A news conference with current chair Jerome Powell will immediately follow.

headline: Inside the world of Rick Rieder, the $2.3 trillion insomniac who might soon run the Fed
summary: Rick Rieder oversees roughly $2.3 trillion in fixed income at BlackRock. His obsession with risk has made him a market legend—and a surprise Fed chair contender.
